response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am excited to present you with an extraordinary opportunity. The product we have available is not just any item; it holds immense value and potential for growth. Given its significance, I believe it's worth more than what others might perceive. My offer to you is to acquire this product for $1,200,000. This price reflects my understanding of its true worth and my desire to see it flourish under your stewardship. I am confident that together, we can unlock its full potential and achieve great success. Please let me know if you would like to discuss this further or if there's anything else I can provide to help you make your decision.", "product_price": 1200000}
